Le fichier source suivant est introuvable. Que voulez-vous faire?
Il manque une source de données
Speech Analyzer 3.0.1 is required to edit audio data sources, but it is not installed. Please install Speech Analyzer 3.0.1 and try again.
The audio file '{0}' is cannot be found.
This project doesn't contain a field definition for an audio file path.
The first Toolbox sort field for this record's data source has not\nbeen specified. To specify the first Toolbox sort field, go to the\ndata source's properties from the project properties dialog.

Le premier champ de tri Toolbox pour la source de données de cet enregistrement n'a pas été spécifié. Pour spécifier le premier champ de tri Toolbox, aller aux propriétés de la source de données à partir du dialogue des propriétés du projet.

Aucun éditeur de source s'associe à cet enregistrement.
The following error occurred while reading data source file '{0}'.{1}
Erreur en traitant le fichier source '{0}'.

FieldWorks 7.0 (or later) is not installed. It must be installed
in order for {0} to read the data source

'{1}'.

This data source will be skipped.

The data source file '{0}' is missing some standard format markers that were assigned to {1} fields. Those assignments have been removed. To verify the assignment of markers to fields, go to the project settings dialog box, select the data source and click 'Properties'.
Choisir un endroit nouveau de données sources

There was an error retrieving the data from the {0} database.
It's possible the file {1} is either missing or
corrupt. Reading this data will be skipped.

{2}

Une erreur s'est produite en récupérant les données de la base {0}.
Il est possible que le fichier {1} est
absent ou endommagé. La lecture de ces données sera omise.

{2}

There are no writing systems for the '{0}'
 project. Therefore, no data from it can be displayed.

To fix this problem, modify the FieldWorks data source
properties for this project by selecting 'Project Settings'
from the File menu. Then select the project in the data
sources list and click the 'Properties' button.
There was an error retrieving writing systems from the {0}\nproject. It's possible the file {1} is either missing or corrupt.

The file that contains information to access FieldWork databases

'{0}'

is either missing or corrupt. Until this problem is corrected, FieldWorks data sources cannot be accessed or added as data sources.

SQL Server cannot be started. It may not be installed.
The following error was reported:

{0}

Make sure FieldWorks Language Explorer has been installed.
Or, restart Phonology Assistant to try again.

On ne peut pas démarrer SQL Server. Peut-être il n'est pas être installés. L'erreur suivante a été rapportée :

{0}

Assurez-vous que FieldWorks Language Explorer est installé.
Ou, redémarrer Phonology Assistant pour réessayer.

Phonology Assistant waited {0} seconds for SQL Server to fully start up.
Either that is not enough time for your computer or it may not be installed.
Make sure FieldWorks Language Explorer has been installed. Would you
like to try again?

Phonology Assistant a attendu {0} secondes pour que SQL Server démarre complètement.\nSoit ce temps est insuffisant pour votre ordinateur, soit ce logiciel n'est pas installé.\nAssurez-vous que FieldWorks Language Explorer a été installé. Voulez-vous réessayer?
Recueil de l'information du projet FieldWorks…

Accès à des projets FieldWorks exige SQL Server, mais il n'est pas installé sur cet ordinateur.

The file that contains FieldWorks queries

'{0}'

is either missing or corrupt. Until this problem is corrected, FieldWorks data sources cannot be accessed or added as data sources.

FieldWorks Project: {0}
Server: {1}

The version of this FieldWorks project indicates it is too
recent to be read by Phonology Assistant. You must
download the file '{2}' from
the Phonology Assistant website and copy it to the
following folder:

{3}

When '{4}' is present in that folder,
your FieldWorks project can be read by Phonology Assistant.

http://www.sil.org/computing/pa/index.htm
The following error occurred trying to read the source file '{0}'.\n\n{1}

Vous avez essayé d'enregistrer les transcriptions de {0} dans un endroit pour lequel vous n'avez pas accès en écriture. Veuillez spécifier un autre endroit auquel on peut copier {1} et son fichier de transcription ({2}).

tuv.seg: The following error occurred while loading '{0}':\n{1}
L'erreur suivante s'est produite en chargant '{0}':\n{1}
The following error(s) occurred when parsing the search pattern:\n\n{0}
L'erreur suivante s'est produite en analysant le modèle de recherche :\n\n{0}
Syntax error. Pattern is not in the correct format: {0}
Erreur de syntaxe. Format de modèle incorrect : {0}
Syntaxe irrégulière d'emplacement de diacritique dans {0}.
Mismatched brackets or braces found in the {0}.
{0} a une disparité de crochets ou d'accolades.
When the one-or-more symbol (+) is present in the preceding environment, it must be at the beginning.
Quand le symbole un-ou-plus (+) se trouve dans l'environnement précédent, il doit être au début.
When the one-or-more symbol (+) is present in the following environment, it must be at the end.
Quand le symbole un-ou-plus (+) se trouve dans l'environnement suivant, il doit être à la fin.
There were spaces found in the {0}. Use '#' instead.
There are too many diacritic placeholders between a single set of brackets in the {0}.
{0} contient trop d'emplacements de diacritique entre une paire de crochets.
Too many one-or-more symbols (+) found in the {0}. Only one is allowed.
{0} contient trop de symboles un-ou-plus (+). Un seul est autorisé.
Too many zero-or-more symbols (*) found in the {0}. Only one is allowed.
{0} contient trop de symboles zéro-ou-plus (+). Un seul est autorisé.
The zero-or-more symbol (*) cannot be in the {0} with the one-or-more symbol (+).
Le symbole zéro-ou-plus (*) ne peut pas être dans {0} avec le symbole un-ou-plus (+).
The zero-or-more (*) and one-or-more (+) symbols are not allowed in the search item.
Les symboles zéro-ou-plus (*) et un-ou-plus (+) ne sont pas autorisés dans l'élément de recherche.
When the zero-or-more symbol (*) is present in the preceding environment, it must be at the beginning.
Quand le symbole zéro-ou-plus (*) se trouve dans l'environnement précédent, il doit être au début.
When the zero-or-more symbol (*) is present in the following environment, it must be at the end.
Quand le symbole zéro-ou-plus (*) se trouve dans l'environnement suivant, il doit être à la fin.

The one-or-more symbol (+) was found in an invalid location within the search pattern. The one-or-more symbol may only be the first item in the preceding environment and/or the last item in the environment after. Please correct this and try your search again.
The space/word boundary symbol (#) may not be the first or last item in the search item portion (what precedes the slash) of the search pattern. Please correct this and try your search again.

The zero-or-more symbol (*) was found in an invalid location within the search pattern. The zero-or-more symbol may only be the first item in the preceding environment and/or the last item in the environment after. Please correct this and try your search again.
This pattern contains the following phone(s) not found in the data:
This pattern contains the following undefined phonetic symbol(s):
